changelog.change: Added support for 1.0.0 version of the game (just cause!)
Retargeted to use .NET 4.6.1 (since it's the current version of .NET that LiveSplit uses)
Added support for 1.4 version of the game.
Added restoring original game code on GameMemory object dispose, to prevent an issue where the component can't find a signature after settings update.
Added option to autostart on first load completion.
Implemented list of levels excluded from autosplitting (MainMenu, IntroSequence, Credits).
Added note regarding to 1.02 version of the game in settings window.
Added a label that is reflecting current status of Autosplitter (if it's injected, if it found process etc.)
Added support for 1.0.2 version of the game (before Vault of Nyx OOB was patched).
Added support for 1.1 version of the game.
